html:
7.17.21  6:17 pm   i would like to congratulate you on making it to the lowest frequency tier in the Oxford English Dictionary with the word 'embrightened'. they rank words by frequency of usage in all the recorded english text they have access to (which is a lot) on a scale from 1-8, and the verb 'embrighten' sits firmly at a 1. do you have any plans for rescuing other words on the brink of extinction

      i thought i made that one up

7.17.21  5:21 pm   What's your favourite day of the year?

      july 17

7.17.21  5:10 pm   where were you when you found out D7b9 is also f#dim7/D

      must have been in the playroom

7.17.21  5:09 pm   Why did u create spiders

      to dazzle you

7.17.21  3:49 pm   what's your favourite song?

      i haven't found it yet, that's why i keep making new ones just in case

7.17.21  2:37 pm   opinions on walmart

      too small. smallmart, is what i'd call it

7.17.21  11:23 am   Do you expect the period of music learning/changing/whatever to take as long as your switch to 3D animation, or will it be much shorter?

Thanks

      i expect to do everything in 1 day, every day, and to do it differently each day

7.17.21  10:57 am   How r u so legendary 

      by setting up a series of shadow companies i've been able to inconspicuously sell my soul to myself

7.17.21  9:16 am   how to lose at spelling?

      go on a dark and 'windy' forest path

7.17.21  8:13 am   whats your favorite number

      20210718072552

7.17.21  3:38 am   Hi Bill, how do you not get inspired by others?

     maybe if i'm in a bad mood

      Because sometimes I'm inspiring from someone without even knowing, and I just ponder how do I fend off against these things?

      you could go to the direct center of outer space

7.17.21  3:19 am   Why do we exist

      some sort of cross-referencing routine

7.17.21  1:29 am   I simply need to know what the story is behind "Chaka Khan" in I'm A Princess and the song being released on her birthday.

     coincidence

     Was it her birthday when you originally wrote that bit in,

     yes, also a coincidence

      or did you realize it was going to be released on her birthday

     absolutely not, if i knew it was going to take 2 years i may have commited suicide. i was aiming for 1 week, and i really thought i had it

     and go in to rerecord that one line, or is it just one big coincidence?

     it's 2 big coincidences

7.17.21  12:51 am   how do you get over procrastinating? im in too deep.

      just take a break from procrastinating and finish it later

7.17.21  12:30 am   How do you explain yourself to the cops

      start out by saying i'm a person

7.16.21  8:56 pm   if i'm in the key of C Maj and there's a chord that consists of the notes D F and A (not necessarily in that order) with A in the bass, should  I call it Dm/A or F6/A????

     probably Dm/A

     does it even matter?

     F6/A might mean to include a C note

     under what circumstances would it matter? thx

     if you want to not have the C note

7.16.21  5:32 pm   how do i transcribe chords from songs without perfect pitch? i can approximate them with trial and error but even that is unreliable

      you can use an instrument for reference, even for just the first note, and then you may not need the instrument for the rest, but you can still use it

7.16.21  5:08 pm   help I'm stuck at the end of the creative process! Even tho I've had my last project finished and released for months now, I can't seem to reset back to the beginning and be open minded enough to start something new and not be worried about where it will be posted/how I will produce it/ how it will make me enough money to live///////// what do i do?

      how about hitting rock bottom, for maybe an afternoon

7.16.21  3:47 pm   how did you make that shzhzhzhzhzhzh sound in airport terminal?

      using my voice and mouth

7.16.21  3:42 pm   Why did you decide too make YouTube videos ????

      i didn't, BUT, eventually after making videos for a while i realized that youtube is a powerful site, so i put the videos there, hoping that that it would make the videos more powerful

7.16.21  3:13 pm   Hi Bill! Out of all the songs you've made, which would you say is your favorite?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

7.16.21  2:50 pm   what do you think of birds?

      they are a close cousin of other birds

7.16.21  11:37 am   do you double-track your lead vocals?

      for about half the lines

7.16.21  9:28 am   are you tired of creating stuff on youtube

      i have never created anything on youtube. i compose my videos offline and then upload them

7.16.21  8:59 am   what are your motivations on making these wonderful masterpieces?

      i am hoping this could make me eligible for some awards and prizes

7.16.21  6:38 am   What is your most controversial opinion?

      facts are a myth

7.16.21  1:54 am   squares are neat, do you think you could make a song about one?

      that seems like ths kind of thing i would do unintentionally

7.16.21  12:27 am   Do you make all your white noise effects yourself, use the help of presets, or both? I've tried figuring out the noise oscillator on my synthesizer but I can't make anything sound like anything other than "hisss" (as opposed to "whoosh" or "whoom" or "shwowshowshow")

      try using an FM synthesizer. you will have a lot of fun

7.15.21  11:55 pm   Why do you make songs?

      i am hoping this could make me eligible for some awards and prizes

7.15.21  9:08 pm   Have you ever considered cannibalism?

      no

7.15.21  8:31 pm   what kind of updates and developments in the music recording department are you making?

      just trying to make it normal

7.15.21  6:39 pm   thoughts on gangnam style? 

      that is the default style

7.15.21  6:09 pm   what's your favorite voicing from your upcoming song?

      C

7.15.21  6:02 pm   Going to the beach :) have any fun beach ideas? 

      go out to sea

7.15.21  4:21 pm   what do you think of Italians? 

      sometimes i try to guess what country they're from

7.15.21  4:19 pm   What is the meaning of life

      time

7.15.21  3:36 pm   favorite weird chord?

      C

7.15.21  1:31 pm   What is your favorite song of your own?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

7.15.21  1:23 pm   is your refriderator running?

      i'd even go so far to say it's functioning

7.15.21  1:21 pm   can a song in a major scale be extremely sad?

      sure

7.15.21  1:18 pm   In "song I like" there's lyrics: "so cold down in Alabama, it's so cold down in L.A." does the LA stand for Los Angeles or Lower Alabama?

      los angeles

7.15.21  12:49 pm   Are you a psychologist

      i have some psychologist costumes

7.15.21  10:59 am   how to be more brave about saying things you want to in your songs, instead of being afraid?

      you might have to journey to the edge of the earth

7.15.21  10:43 am   have you ever been betrayed, abandoned, or otherwise made an incoherent fool out of?

      yes, that is my daily routine

7.15.21  7:55 am   why do people defend election fraud?

      they would have to think it's not fraud

7.15.21  2:43 am   which is the best free editing software to begin with?

      linux?

7.15.21  1:06 am   can a song in a minor scale be extremely happy? 

      sure

7.14.21  11:43 pm   help I need to create something like im going insane cause I've gotta let something out but I just have no ideas, not even any bad one, and I broke my one good idea by making it and then screwing it up. I've tried just going on my software and making something completely random, but it just doesn't feel right, and it has no meaning at all. how do I get good ideas

      you are going to have to calm down. Here are the 2 ways i would recommend: first, create 10 bad ideas, and stay calm about how bad they are. this is only part of the exercise. The other half of the exercise is to try to get so calm that you are not trying to think of any ideas anymore. as soon as the ideas sense that you are not chasing them, they will begin to chase you. and you can write them down easily, now that i've practiced writing things down when you were writing down the bad ideas before

7.14.21  11:37 pm   in no harm, there is a part where you're wearing a suit and you put a cup on your head while eating a banana. was that supposed to be showing that everyone is weird and that they should love how weird they arw?

      this was all a coordinated attempt to make the best video i could, in very limited time (about 1 or 2 days). The time length of the song choice also plays crucially into this strategy

7.14.21  8:56 pm   describe your next song in exactly 4 words

      it's going pretty good
